Name: Brave Old World
rawData:
Brave Old World is an international klezmer band formed in 1989.
Members hail from the US and Germany.   The Washington Post called Brave Old World "the revival's first supergroup. Every player is a virtuoso.‚Äù
In 1992, the group won first prize at the International Klezmer Festival in Safed, Israel. Clarinetist Joel Rubin was a founding member.
